trans-unit.source: Provides methods and properties for all activity designers that display parallel vertical layouts on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Fornece métodos e propriedades para todos os designers de atividade que exibem layouts verticais paralelos em uma superfície de design do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: An activity designer that displays a parallel vertical layout represents an activity on the workflow design surface that has two code paths that a workflow can follow.
trans-unit.target: Um designer de atividade que exibe um layout vertical paralelo representa uma atividade na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho que tem dois caminhos de código que pode seguir um fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: For example, the designer used for the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> activity displays the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> activity on the workflow design surface and has a parallel vertical layout.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o designer usado para o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> atividade exibe o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> atividade no fluxo de trabalho superfície de design e tem um layout vertical paralelo.

trans-unit.source: Each branch of the parallel layout visually represents an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity> activity contained in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: Cada ramificação do layout paralela representa visualmente uma <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity> atividades contidas o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> atividade.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> that describes the location to move the activities to.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> que descreve o local para o qual mover as atividades.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> read-only collection that contains the activities to move.
trans-unit.target: A coleção somente leitura <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> que contém as atividades a serem movidas.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether child activities of the activity associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" /> can be moved.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se atividades filho da atividade associada ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" /> podem ser movidas.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the activities can be moved from the parent activity; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se as atividades puderem ser movidas da atividade pai; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.CanMoveActivities%2A> method to allow the moving of child activities within the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como substituir o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.CanMoveActivities%2A> método para permitir a movimentação de atividades filho dentro do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: The read-only collection of activities to remove.
trans-unit.target: A coleção somente leitura de atividades a remover.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether child activities of the activity associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" /> can be deleted.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se atividades filho da atividade associada ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" /> podem ser excluídas.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the activities can be deleted from the parent activity; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se as atividades puderem ser excluídas da atividade pai; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.CanRemoveActivities%2A> method to allow the moving of child activities within the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como substituir o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.CanRemoveActivities%2A> método para permitir a movimentação de atividades filho dentro do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the first selectable object in the navigation order of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o primeiro objeto selecionável na ordem de navegação do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is the first selectable object in the designer navigation order.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que é o primeiro objeto selecionável na ordem de navegação do designer.

trans-unit.source: If the designer's <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A> property or the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsVisible%2A> property is set to `false`, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.FirstSelectableObject%2A> returns a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Se o designer <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A> propriedade ou o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsVisible%2A> está definida como `false`, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.FirstSelectableObject%2A> retorna uma referência nula (`Nothing` no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> property count is greater than 0, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.FirstSelectableObject%2A> returns the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> associated with the first activity designer in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> propriedade count é maior que 0, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.FirstSelectableObject%2A> retorna o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> associada com o designer de atividade primeiro na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that defines the x- and y-coordinates for the drop target.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> que define as coordenadas x e y para a reprodução automática.

trans-unit.source: Returns array of rectangles that represent the valid drop locations within the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma matriz de retângulos que representam os locais de destino válidos dentro do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> array that represents the valid drop locations within the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: A matriz <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa os locais de destino válidos no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Object" /> in the navigation order.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Object" /> atual na ordem de navegação.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection" /> enumeration value that determines the navigation order of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de enumeração <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection" /> que determina a ordem de navegação do designer.

trans-unit.source: Returns the first selectable object that follows the specified object in the navigation order of the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o primeiro objeto selecionável que segue o objeto especificado na ordem de navegação do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that follows the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que segue o objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the last selectable object in the navigation order of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o último objeto selecionável na ordem de navegação do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is the last selectable object in the designer navigation order.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que é o último objeto selecionável na ordem de navegação do designer.

trans-unit.source: If the designer's <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsVisible%2A> property is set to `false`, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.LastSelectableObject%2A> returns a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Se o designer <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A> ou <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsVisible%2A> está definida como `false`, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.LastSelectableObject%2A> retorna uma referência nula (`Nothing` no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner> contains child activity designers, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.LastSelectableObject%2A> returns the last selectable object associated with the first child activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner> contém designers de atividade filho, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.LastSelectableObject%2A> retorna o último objeto selecionável associado com o designer de atividade filho primeiro.

trans-unit.source: If the child activity designer is collapsed, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.LastSelectableObject%2A> returns the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> associated with the first activity designer in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Se o designer de atividade filho estiver recolhido, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.LastSelectableObject%2A> retorna o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> associada com o designer de atividade primeiro no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> coleção.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the user has created a new branch activity on the activity associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Indica que o usuário criou uma nova atividade de branch na atividade associada ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" /> that was added as the new branch of the activity associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity" /> que foi adicionado como o novo branch da atividade associada ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> that contains the layout arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> que contém os argumentos de layout.

trans-unit.source: Performs layout tasks to position visual cues and child designers on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Executa tarefas de layout para posicionar indicações visuais e designers filho no <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="e" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> contém uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> that contains the layout arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> que contém os argumentos de layout.

trans-unit.source: Sets the size of the visual cues on the designers contained within the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Define o tamanho das indicações visuais nos designers contidos dentro do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that contains the new size settings for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que contém as novas configurações de tamanho para o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs" /> that contains the drawing arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs" /> que contém os argumentos de desenho.

trans-unit.source: Draws the visual representation of the activity associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" /> at design time.
trans-unit.target: Desenha a representação visual da atividade associada ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" /> em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of designer verbs to be associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de verbos do designer a serem associados ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerbCollection" /> that contains the designer verbs to associate with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerbCollection" /> que contém os verbos do designer para associar o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.Verbs%2A> property determines the commands that are displayed on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner> context menu.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner.Verbs%2A> propriedade determina os comandos que são exibidos no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner> menu de contexto.

trans-unit.source: The verb collection includes any designer verbs <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner> inherits from the designer classes it extends.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de verbo inclui qualquer verbos do designer <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ParallelActivityDesigner> herda das classes designers aumenta.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.Verbs%2A> property to insert custom verb actions for a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como substituir o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.Verbs%2A> propriedade inserir ações verbo personalizado para um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: The `CreateActivityVerbs` creates a new <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb> named `"Add New Parallel Branch"` and associates an event handler named `OnAddParallelBranch`.
trans-unit.target: O `CreateActivityVerbs` cria um novo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerb> chamado `"Add New Parallel Branch"` e associa um manipulador de eventos chamado `OnAddParallelBranch`.

trans-unit.source: When the verb is clicked in the workflow designer, the event handler is called.
trans-unit.target: Quando o verbo for clicado no designer de fluxo de trabalho, o manipulador de eventos é chamado.
